content.description: The graph below shows the change in sea level from the Cambrian period to today compared to todayâ€™s sea level.
content.question: Which of the following statements correctly describes the trends seen in the data?

choices.label: The highest sea level occurred in the Triassic period.
The lowest sea level occurred during the Paleogene period.
The first rise in sea level occurred during the Cretaceous period.
Sea level decreased from the beginning of the Triassic period to the end of the Cretaceous period.

content.answer: The lowest sea level occurred during the Paleogene period.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
